mapper.update: update board set board_readcount = board_readcount+1 where board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.select: select b.*, (select name from member where member.id=b.board_id) name from board b where board_num = #{board_num}
select count(*) from board where board_content like '%'|| #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ||'%'
select rownum no, n.*, (select name from member m where m.id=n.board_id) name from (select * from board) n order by board_notice desc, no desc
